text:
Luis Fernando Camacho Vaca (born 15 February 1979) is a Bolivian lawyer, businessman and activist. He is a member of the Revolutionary Nationalist Movement in Bolivia.
He was a major critic of Evo Morales in the 2019 Bolivian general elections, demanding Morales resign on 5 November 2019. He unsuccessfully ran for President of Bolivia in 2020.
